description: This course will provide students with key principles of biochemistry & molecular biology. Topics covered include protein structure & function, biochemistry of DNA replication, transcription & translation, basic bioinformatics. Properties of enzymes. Key metabolic pathways & their regulation. This course will be of importance across the biological & biomedical sciences.
prerequisites: (BIOL1020 or BIOM1050 or BIOM1051) + (CHEM1100, CHEM1221, CHEM1222, CHEM1021, or CHEM1022)
